评论详情: i really like this wallet. it’s small, holds cards well and protects them. has a place for cash, isn’t too thick, is great quality. 10/10
All the guys like them for front pocket use

I love the sleek design and the ease of access for cards and cash. I tried another ‘Ridge’-like metal wallet (cheaper versions than The Ridge), but I hated the access to my cards and cash. It was always a struggle. This wallet is so slim and slight I often forget which pocket it’s in! For the price and performance it can’t be beaten.
Wallet is not easy to use. It’s hard to put cash or card and even more hard to take out. Drivers license fits but very hard to take out.
Nice rich color and card holders are easy to access.

I guess you get what you pay for. Simply put, the slots to hold credit cards and the pouch to hold cash are very tight. Very difficult to remove the cards or cash from the wallet. Otherwise, it's fine.
looks well with wallet
The middle section is very very tight to fit money in so not very functional

评论概述: Excellent design for protection of personal information
评论详情: It's a fantastic card wallet for protecting the personal information from being read unauthorizedly via electronic devices.
Sturdy and fit well in my pocket. No more bulky wallet. I like that it has a cut out place to push the card up with your finger so it's easier to access you credit card.
Nice little wallet with a lot of compartments. It is not leather but it is OK for the price.
I'll use this for a quick change for smaller purses, no need for a bulky wallet. Chose this one for it's RFID protection. Good quality for the price. I bought a second one for a gift.
Quality,protection

its like 2 slim wallets in one. i have 3 cards. i don't need 7 slots and multiple bill folds. so i cut it in half. its cheap. it protects my cars from getting damaged by my keys.  if ur not sure about getting this wallet, just don't keep ur keys with your cards. im not that smart
Well seems to keep all your cards in place i like that
Very nice thin wallet , just what I’m looking for, you won’t go wrong especially the price, , will be a good gift to anyone
Buen material, tiene buena capacidad  para tarjetas y efectivo, no molesta, puedes guardarla en cualquier bolsillo.

评论概述: The Perfect Wallet for Everyday Use
评论详情: I’ve been using this slim minimalist wallet for a few weeks, and it’s absolutely fantastic! The sleek design is perfect for anyone looking to downsize their bulky wallet. Despite its compact size, it holds all my essentials—credit cards, ID, and a few bills—without feeling cramped.  The material feels premium and durable, showing no signs of wear so far.
Perfect size, quality material and durable. Card slide out with ease and the multiple slots allows versatility

Exactly what I wanted! The material is very nice and feels durable, the color is pretty, and it's just the perfect tiny wallet/cardholder for small purses or clutches, or just to slip in your pocket or belt bag on the go.
I bought this wallet to replace my phone wallet I had as I traded up phone. I love it. It small, compacted and I carry 13 cards and currency with no issues. Well worth the money I paid.

If you are going to put a card in every slot in this, it will be a snug fit. It’s not bad for what it is at the price. It’s not perfect, the stitching is a bit tight and it pulls a bit from the tension created with all the cards. Can’t hold much cash. I use it as a minimalist wallet since I don’t handle large sums of cash, just what I need when I need and I have all the card slots full because am out and about all the time.

评论概述: Perfect Travel Wallet—Slim, Secure, and Stylish!
评论详情: We travel quite a bit, and I needed a reliable travel wallet to keep things simple and secure. The Hoewina Slim Minimalist Wallet fits the bill (pun absolutely intended)!  Why I Love It: Compact and Slim: This wallet is perfect for travel. It easily slips into my front pocket, making it both convenient and secure. I don’t take all my credit cards with me when traveling, so the compact size is ideal for carrying just the essentials.  RFID Blocking: The added RFID-blocking feature gives me peace of mind, knowing my cards are protected from skimming. It’s a must-have feature when you’re traveling in busy areas or internationally.  Durable and Stylish: The wallet feels sturdy and well-made. Its minimalist design looks sharp without being flashy. It’s functional without sacrificing style.  Final Thoughts: If you’re looking for a slim, lightweight travel wallet that holds just the essentials while offering extra security, this one’s a winner. It’s sleek, practical, and perfect for anyone who likes to travel light.  Rating: 5/5 Great wallet for travel—compact, secure, and stylish. Highly recommend!

For the price, it's a handy little wallet and fits well in a pocket. It's not high end but it gets the job done. I don't have a way to test the RFID so I am just trusting on this. Personally, I have decided I prefer a landscape design instead of portrait for card storage. Although portrait is slightly more secure, it's also harder to remove the cards and identify them tucked in since it seems almost all cards are black these days.
Love the colors, slots are a little tight but that is not always a bad thing . They do need to have a brake in time . Will buy more as needed.
Works as it should
This is a great wallet! It is super slim. It holds your cards so none of them slide out. I would definitely recommend this wallet
Good cards capacity ( really appreciate the id or driving license view) Well design but the feeling is not so good. Surely it's not leather

评论概述: Slim and stiff wallet, just what I needed
评论详情: I am a front pocket wallet carrier.  This slim wallet fits even with slim jeans on.  It holds all the essentials for me without having a bulge.  My general contents are 2 IDs, medical cards, and 3 bank cards.  Still room in there for some folded bills and other essentials (band-aid or other.)

It was time to replace my wallet. I had another exactly like this, but leather. This is perfect! Slim and holds everything I need with me. I love the noticeable carbon fiber look it has too. It needs time to be broken in though as it's very sturdy and stiff.  Definitely a win.

评论概述: Great price is what it said. Like it
评论详情: Just what they said. Great for front pocket. Holds enough cards and id
Slim, stylish, and perfect for minimalists. Holds all my cards and ID with ease. Durable, high-quality materials and sleek design make it a must-have accessory.
Openings are too small for some cards.
Perfect alternative to bulky wallet when you don't need to carry everything.  Snugly holds several card, driver's license, transit cards and a couple of bills, but profile is very thin.

评论概述: It’s exactly what it says it is
评论详情: Exactly as described seems like it’ll last forever
see photo. New, right out of the box, coming apart.

评论概述: Good slim wallet card holders are a tight fit
评论详情: Good wallet so far good build quality, Ive had it for about a month now and there is no tearing or fraying.  The cash pocket in the center is something i was specifically looking for and works well, if cash is important this wallet can easily hold 15 bills, but you could definitely fit more.  My only complaint about this wallet is the front card slot with notch to assist in pushing the card out is very difficult to use.

The Hoewina Slim Wallet is a really nice product. I appreciated the way it is shipped, It came in a box and wrapped in paper. It holds up to 4 cards and has a slot for your ID. I like the carbon fiber look and it looks well made. I use it mainly for travel and concerts, it allows me to bring just what I need. I expect this to hold up for a long time. I would definitely recommend this product.
For $3 it's a pretty decent wallet. You can tell it's not high quality but you get what you paid for. I just received mine today. Hopefully it holds up well in the long run.

I had always wanted to try a minimalist wallet and this is nicely made and perfect if you use just a few cards.  Since I use my Apple watch most of the time for payments my wallet hardly leaves my pocket.

I recommend this product to anyone in the market for something to hold just a few cards and a few bills (dollars) I had been using a aluminuma wallet and a money clip but the money clip was magnetic and keep pulling out of my pocket when I pulled out my keys, and sometimes I didn't notice and lost my money clip so I stated just carrying a few bills that were flod as if they were in a money clip but they some times would work their way up and fall out of my pocket. This seems to solve the problem but it doesn't hold much money,and only  7 cards, I  keep 5 cards and two IDs, it will hold around 5/6 bills folded twice okay but more than that you would need something else. To hold the extra cash.

If you are a Costanza and sit tilted when you have your wallet in your back pocket, maybe it's time for a wallet diet! I ditched the traditional bi-fold/tri-fold wallets years ago in favor of slim leather, then metal and then the newer composite ones. They all work well, but sometimes you want the feel of an old school wallet without the bulk.  This wallet is so close to being perfect (for me). It's just a bit too big in its overall size, but it's the perfect thickness for a slim wallet that can house what most people carry.  For me it's my ID and a few various cards. Even when packed with all my cards it is still thinner than the wallet I had been using (see photo). Docked one star because of it's larger width/height. But it still feels comfortable in pocket because it is so slim.  Recommended!
It does provide RFID protection as indicated.  Great product with good value.  Highly recommended.

I’m really impressed with this wallet. It’s slim, minimalist, and holds all my essential cards and cash without bulking up my pocket. The RFID blocking feature gives me peace of mind, especially when traveling. The leather feels premium, and the design is simple yet stylish. Perfect for anyone who wants a sleek and functional wallet without the unnecessary bulk.
I've seen other wallets that claim to be slim, but this is the thinnest I have ever seen.  As a result, the card slots are a little tight (they might wear in after usage), but it is super thin.

I love the Hoewina slim wallet.  This wallet holds up to 6 cards, 1 ID card with window, and a bill slot, but from my use, you can add a few more cards within any of the slots, and still keep this slim.  Excellent for keeping in your front pocket and still lighter in weight and bulk than a cell phone, for a comparison.  No more bulky pockets.  Looks and feels nice, easy to hold and access cards, and it's offered at an exceptional price.  Great solution for those who prefer a minimalist small front pocket or jacket pocket wallet instead of a brick in their back pocket.

I love how this slim wallet can fit lots of cards and I’d and room for a little cash. I can basically fit everything I need to in this little guy. The center opening is a great place to hold some cash, as well as using the credit card slots for cards. The ID window works well to hold the ID and be able to read it without removing it. I can usually just show my wallet and never have to take it out. The quality feels really substantial with strong stitching. I feel like this will hold up really well.

My husband and I have used slim wallets similar to this for years. In this day of cell phones and other paraphenalia you end up carrying a slim wallet is welcome and does the job.  This one is a bargain at $5.  It looks well made and is attractive.  This one is a shimmery silver, suitable for both men and women. It has 3 long slots and 4 credit card insert slots, one with a see-through front.  It is put together snuggly so I doubt if you fill all the slots the materials would come out easily .My  cell phone cover holds 2 cards, which for me is my main credit card and ID card. Most of the time when I'm running errands that is enough. But when I think I'll need medical cards, other credit cards, etc. I'm going to slip this in my pocket.  I don't know how long this wallet will last, but at the low price if I had to replace it yearly it would be a bargain!
This wallet is slim and the leather seems like it will hold up well. It is wide though which makes it uncomfortable when it's in pockets.

Got to replace a similar minimalist wallet.  Like how all slots are snug for one or two cards.  But not too snug.  Leather or whatever it is is soft and supple and has a good grain to it.  RFID blocking too.  Well I could not test that but will take their word for it. I can fit my ID and a swisscard and 6 credit cards and a couple of bills folded up.A great wallet.

This is a good quality slim wallet. My son really likes it. It's a great first wallet for him. He liked the size and the color and style of it. He said it was what he was looking for. It's thin enough to not be a problem in his pocket. Easy to hold.  It has a space in the center to hold a little bit of cash.

I have a couple of wallets like this from other brands.  I really like how slim these wallets are and they are very comfortable being carried in the front pockets of your trousers. Plenty of compartments for necessary ID's and credit cards.

This wallet came nicely packaged and protected.  Overall construction and materials are good quality with no lose threads.  There is room for your driver's license and a credit card on one side, and 3 more credit cards on the other.  The outside pocket has slot to make getting the card out a bit easier.  I keep my go to credit card in this pocket.  The cards stick out of the rest of the pockets enough to grab them with a little effort.  A center pocket holds a few bills, and there are two more side pockets for more credit cards or receipts.  The center pocket is a little stiff to squeeze open, maybe due to the RF blocking?  Loaded up, it is still thin and light weight.  The black leather goes with about everything.  Nice wallet, I would recommend.

评论概述: Slim but WIDE.  And that silver is.... very shiny!
评论详情: I wanted a new RFID blocking slim wallet and got this. First, don't get the gray/silver.  It's SHINY.  I am NOT confident enough to pull this out in public.  Second, while it's slim, it's WIDE and TALL. It's bigger than my old one.  Third, nowhere do I see or read that it's actually an RFID blocking device.  That's super important these days. So, maybe a no go for me but it might be up your alley.

This is a great little wallet that won't be bulky in your pocket but still allow you to easily carry and organize a number of cards. This one I got feels like smooth, soft leather, too. Very nice. Comes in a gift box as well if you are thinking about giving it as a gift.

评论概述: Slim as advertised ... holds a good number of cards
评论详情: The material is more like a suede and does not slip easily into or out of my pocket. My old wallet was worn smooth leather and made for easy access. I like the number of cards it holds, the one with a slot on the outside (bottom slot, not clear slot for the ID) does not allow for an easy release of the card there. More effort than I expected to get a card out. It is affordable ... but I worry about how long it might last.

The wallet holds 3 cards and a photo ID. It has 2 side slots for cash, stamps, or any other slim item you want to keep in there. The bottom card slot and the ID slot have thumb openings to help get the items out. Obviously, the top ones do not and the slots get tighter from bottom to top so the top ones are really keeping that card securely in there. It is slim enough to be comfortably used in a back pocket without having to remove it when you sit. Worth the money if you’re looking for a back pocket wallet to grab the essentials and go!

This is a black minimalist wallet.  Comes nicely packed in a box and is ready for gifting.  This wallet has a compartment with a transparent window, which is ideal for one’s identification card.  There are four other slots for credit cards.  Two side and one middle pockets for folded bills or other cards.  Wallet is slim and does not take up much room.  Perfect for slipping into pockets!  Great price!  Great value!

评论概述: Great, sleek look.  Fits a ton of stuff, but with a very tight fit.
评论详情: I've been using this wallet for a few weeks now.  It is very slim and sleek, the faux carbon fiber design looks great.  My only complaint is that when it is full, it is a very tight fit. I know this will get better over time, but wanted to include that in my review.  This is perfect for anyone that doesn't carry much cash.

评论概述: Very Thin Wallet - Not Room for Cash - but who uses that anymore?
评论详情: This is a very thin wallet.  I bought it after tracking how often I used the cash I was carrying around with me. The answer: never. So why carry cash if you never use it. Get a thinner wallet with space for your ID and credit cards. That's what this wallet it. It has more than enough space for my cards.  There is one spot that allows you to push a card out from the bottom. However, it doesn't work very well. I have another wallet with this same design and very similar fabric and that card slides out when you push. This one sticks. It might be the width of the pocket. I guess I'd rather have too tight than too loose. Too loose and you lose your stuff!  Overall a great wallet if you no longer want to carry cash! And very reasonably priced.

This wallet is great for carrying a minimal amount of cards, and an ID. I love that it's not bulky. It's great to take to concerts and short trips. I can carry at least 6 cards and ID, which is really more than enough on any given day. The material is smooth. It fits easily into your pockets and is barely noticed.

评论概述: The wallet ripped when I added my credit cards
评论详情: I've had a thin "front pocket" wallet for awhile now and it's showing its age, so I started looking for a replacement. This wallet (Carbon Fiber Black) is not it. It looked really cool when I got it and it's slightly bigger than my old wallet. It's also rigid. My old wallet is basically denim, this new one feels more like plastic. I assumed it would "loosen up." I added my ID and 3 credit/debit cards. When I tried to add a tile slim tracker (a tile tracker about the same size of a credit card and about twice as thick) to the middle pocket, the wallet ripped. Maybe the other colors/styles will hold up better, but the Carbon Fiber Black wallet is not designed to last.
